definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
horizontal line (in a fraction)/minimum passing score

mixed fraction/mixed number (i.e. with an integer part and a fraction part, e.g. four and three quarters)/see also: improper fraction 假分數|假分数[jia3 fen1 shu4] and proper fraction 真分數|真分数[zhen1 fen1 shu4]
proper fraction (with numerator < denominator, e.g. five sevenths)/see also: improper fraction 假分數|假分数[jia3 fen1 shu4] and mixed number 帶分數|带分数[dai4 fen1 shu4]
improper fraction (with numerator ≥ denominator, e.g. seven fifths)/see also: proper fraction 真分數|真分数[zhen1 fen1 shu4] and mixed number 帶分數|带分数[dai4 fen1 shu4]
preoccupied with school grades/overemphasis on test scores

sentences.english: Overseas Chinese Xiamen engineering college of university enrolls new students in 2009 the fractional line is many?
sentences.chinese: 華僑大學廈門工學院2009年招生分數線是多少？

sentences.english: I was level with my friend in the examination；we got the same number of marks.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友考試成績一樣，我們所得分數相同。

sentences.english: Just think – someone could gain points by getting a library card – how cool is that?
sentences.chinese: 你想想，一個人辦圖書證獲得分數，多酷啊。

sentences.english: Which traffic offences will result in Driving Offence Points?
sentences.chinese: 哪些交通違章會導致違章分數的記錄呢？

sentences.english: There was a significant decrease in the subjects' pretest and post-test scores of attitude and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 學生的英語學習態度和動機前後測分數有顯著降低。

sentences.english: The more the fiber volume fraction is, the lower the critical temperature T crit .
sentences.chinese: 纖維體積分數越大，所需臨界轉變溫度越低。

sentences.english: A score of 100 points integer times, eliminate a bright Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 分數達到100分的整數倍，消除一個亮紅的交叉。

sentences.english: I was able to get her to a point where she was going to, to college, so.
sentences.chinese: 我幫她達到了可以進入大學的分數。

sentences.english: The U.S.' overall EPI score is 81, putting it in 39th place on the list.
sentences.chinese: 美國的EPI綜合分數爲81，在名單中排在39位。

sentences.english: And in the eddy that does not let oneself be immersed in imitate to inscribe a mark.
sentences.chinese: 而不要讓自己陷入模擬題分數的漩渦之中。

sentences.english: Is a fraction of the paragraph.
Each category can be further subdivided, etc. , to use numbers to distinguish between organizations.
sentences.chinese: 每類又可再細分數等，用組織號來區分。

sentences.english: Back to the moody scores, I then wrote "Fogger, Snake, and Mud."
sentences.chinese: 回到穆迪分數，然後我寫了“煙霧機，蛇，和泥。”

sentences.english: eg: I'll have to pick my moments before telling my mother my test scores.
sentences.chinese: 我得選個合適的時機將測驗分數告訴我媽。

sentences.english: The school will test them so often that they want to get the best scores.
sentences.chinese: 學校會經常測驗他們，因而學生都想考到最好的分數。

sentences.english: We always use per thousand sign to express a thousandth.
sentences.chinese: 我們總是用千分號表示千分數。

definition: to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to grade/to mark (student's work)/grade/score (of student's work)
to enter oneself for an examination
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
